caption: Decent spot, but nothing special. The service was average—polite but not attentive. The food looked good but lacked flavor and seasoning. Nice vibe, but not enough to make me want to come back.

Our first real French restaurant since we arrived yesterday and it did not disappoint! Though a little jet lagged from the 25 total flying hours its all good!! Ambiance,  Foods and service was very well presented! Merci beaucop! 🇫🇷 …
Really fantastic food. I followed recommendation of owner and waitress Sarah. Had squid and the most amazing desert. Definitely worth a visit
Extraterritorial Corsica in Paris! Everything is Corsican here from the owner to the oysters 🦪. A great selection of local specialties and wines.

Arrived for dinner without booking and was greeted and very well taken care of throughout our meal.  The quality of the food and drinks are exceptional!  It's so nice to be shown the selection of desserts at the table for you to deliberate on! Will definitely like to come back if we are in Paris again.  Thanks again for your warm Corsican hospitality!

A chic corner brasserie where we only stopped for cafe and dessert. At first the cappuccino was really cold so I had to request for a refresh which they gladly did. So good marks for service. For sweet tooth lovers there is a lot to offer from celebrated patisserie Carl in paris.

Went year for lunch with colleagues, food was good, the seating and atmosphere was great, heated terrace seating allows for people watching in a busy area of Paris all year round. There was a pretty exciting lunch menu, some good a la care options and fantastic desserts. After the meal a complimentary digestif was presented. Staff were friendly and welcoming, yet professional.
Wow. The service was on the top. High quality wine and meat. I really enjoyed.

This restaurant was lovely! Randomly happened to walk in during a rain shower and was greeted by very friendly hosts. Our waitress was learning English but did her best and was equally charming and friendly. Food was lovely and came out quick and was also impressed by the cocktails and wine. The people working here work as a team and that can be seen very clearly. Funny enough, we needed another umbrella due to the rain and the host/manager happened to have a spare. Wonderful establishment.

Lovely waiters, 3 meals just ok ish. Then the cannelloni it was aweful my wife and daughters described it as tasting like sick. We professionally informed the waitress she agreed it didn’t look great and would try her best to obtain a refund. Then came the point that the Manager rudely stated nothing wring with it my chef tasted it and it’s as we normally make it (maybe time for a new chef) Manager not interested in customers views this is no doubt going to damage the business long term with loss of customers and also customers informing others to stay clear. Time for the more senior management to try the food and read your online reviews. My advice try a better restaurant there are loads in Paris.

The staff was very welcoming & friendly. Mary helped feel at home with her smile. The food was delicious and service excellent. It was my birthday and they treated me to a special celebration. Fantastic!

Wonderful service and the food is absolutely delicious. My family shared the leg of lamb and it was perfection! We all loved it. The dessert selection was also lovely and so good. I highly recommend coming here (order the lamb)! Thank you Ron for an incredible meal!

We had breakfast here twice while visiting Paris. The server was so nice and very attentive. The cappuccino was amazing as well as the croissants. We also had omelette and avocado toast which both were very good! The restaurant was clean with a laid back vibe. I definitely recommend this place!

The most delicious food is here. On the same time very friendly people, such a cozy atmosphere and beautiful design of this restaurant. I will be back to this place  again. Highly recommended to whom who likes high quality food
Highly recommend ti try !!!! Its one of few restaurants in Paris I would like to visit every time when I am in town. Food is nothing to compare with!
Great restaurant.  Authentically French and beautiful decor. Our wait staff took excellent care of our family and we enjoyed the experience.

A pleasant dining experience.  Great hospitality. The manager taking our order was English-speaking and provided good explanations and recommendations. One of the servers has worked in Malaysia before, and we had a bit of a chat. Serge was seen moving around.  I had the Cabri rôti aux herbes du maquis, roast goat with Corsican seasoning.  If you’re visiting, you may want to admire some of the establishment’s decor, which reflects a strong Corsican identity. - Paintings by José Lorenzi - Pascal Paoli lounge - Custom-made plates signed by Julien Truchon - Stuffed animals emblematic of the island such as the mouflon which welcomes you at the entrance - An islet presentation of charcuterie, cheeses and wine featuring them - Toilets fully covered in Orezza green (a Corsican stone

We ate dinner here twice, and found the food exceptional.  The traditional Corsican specials with plenty of French dishes made our experience special.  The ambiance is warm and inviting, as are the staff.  So glad we found this delightful neighborhood gem!

A very, very bad experience. We had reserved a table for New Year's Eve. Obviously the restaurant had taken many more reservations than capacity and was overbooked. There were about 100 people at the entrance, all of whom had made reservations and had been waiting for several hours. The man at the entrance was very rude, no explanations and no courtesy for the guests who had made reservations. Instead, a couple of guests who had just arrived were admitted because they apparently "knew" the man at the entrance. A very, very disappointing experience, the worst in Paris. Can't say anything about the cuisine because we didn't try it, but hopefully it's different from the organization of the restaurant.... We then had an excellent dinner in the restaurant opposite "Do re mi". They certainly know what a French restaurant is, especially when it comes to organization and guest hospitality.

We ate here in August 2023.  It was our first meal in Paris and it was great.  My family still talks about the lasagna they ordered.  I had steak tataki which was also great.  Gracious hosts with a lovely setting on the streets of Paris.  It really set the mood for a nice visit in one of the world's top cities.

The night before we left for London we wanted a good meal. The menu here was distinctly amazing. We had the sea bass which was cooked under a cover of salt. The sides of couscous salad, fries and vegetable medley were perfect with the fish. Adding a little olive oil to it somehow brought it up a notch. We also had a starter of Corsica sausage with a curd ham and some type of potato cake with cheese inside it, this was a great way to start our meal.
I’ve been there for the New Year’s dinner and it has been just… amazing. Food and drinks are accompanied by kindness and professionalism of the entire staff, and a strong passion. Strongly suggested.

Typical French bar. Nothing special until you get the tiniest Martini I have ever seen! Addition: In the end the very nice manager came after seeing my comment and apologized! Even offered a new one which was clearly bigger. I guess things happen but of course I can’t accept the nice offer as I wrote the first comment not in order to get some freebies… I will give the bar another chance next time I’m in Paris!

This spot was amazing! I loved the French onion soup. The service was great and very quick. Also it opens until late. Serge and Jeanluc were very attentive and happy to help translate for us. I appreciated their service and the food. 100% recommended to try while you visit Paris.

I came to Paris, going to this restaurant for the very first time. I wasn't expected how food delicous was 🍽🍾🍷😋 the waiter staff was very friendly and kind. Thank you🙏 the food dish taste great 👌 I cannot wait to come back and eat again. Merci 😊

Recommended by one of the hotels around that area. Not disappointed. Once you get in the first impression was that beautiful decorations inside the restaurant. Especially the paintings. The service is good and pretty fast. The food was nice. It was Luiguines Poutargue. Delicious. Wanted to come back. Nice mood French restaurant.
Such a wonderful experience!! The staff were so kind and friendly, and so helpful!  The food was amazing and everything they recommended was delicious!!  An amazing restaurant and highly recommend!!
Very good place to eat we came without reservation. They were good , the atmosphere was very good the service was good. Quiet place.
Absolutely fantastic, it was a little bit hectic but so worth it! The food was 10/10 service perfect our waitress Astrid was amazing
Always trust your concierge! This French Corisica Brasserie didn't dissapoint!! Lovely food, flavors, culture, wine, and most of all the staff were so kind and we will be back!! Merci’!!
Shez was an amazing server & treated us like family!  He was the best captain & excellent server!  We enjoyed the best evening!!
We had a wonderful birthday celebration for my daughter here! The food was excellent and the staff, especially Naere, was magnificent! So much fun!

Excellent choice if you want to eat something delicious! Great place in Paris, delicious food and amazing service, everyone was so helpful and kind, and speak english! They explain the menu and the fantastic names of their dishes. You can eat inside and outside, they're open until late, to have a good meal after long hours of work! Thank you for the amazing experience! Carolina, the forgetful girl of the white bag :)

Our first meal in Paris. Shezad looked after us beautifully, making recommendations and helping us to feel comfortable. We started with a glass of champagne each, then jambon and migliaccioli for entree. For main, we shared a whole fish, filleted and served with olives, tomatoes, creamy mash and vegetables. Absolutely superb! The flavours were amazing. Washed down with a bottle of fiumiccicoli Blanc - very tasty white wine. We shared a cheesecake exotique for desert - just sublime. It wasn’t cheap, at 269 euro, including 2 bottles of sparkling water, but the overall experience was fantastic. Thank you Shezad for looking after us - wonderful memories. Recommended if you want the quality French restaurant experience and are not too worried about time or price.

The food was bad , when I set they give me barcode to order and my meal was €60   when the bill came the charge me €160 ،   When I reject to pay they bring printed menu the meal is €160 later they give discount €100

My first impression of the cafe is that it would be a pleasant place to have my dinner. However, it did NOT go that way at all.  After waiting an hour for our food we saw that our medium rare steak was completely undercooked and extremely small, which we paid 36 euros for. When we sent it back to the chef overcooked it. he On top of that, when we asked for the check it took the only 2 waiters in the restaurant took another 20 minutes to give us it. To make matters worse the owner was just sitting in a ‘throne like chair’ yelling at his employees.  Overall, this was a disappointing experience, and i do not recommend coming here for FOOD.

If you come to Paris you have to come to the L’Elysee Saint Honore’! The food was delicious and the dessert were phenomenal. The wait staff is so friendly and so patient. Please make plans to come and you do not need a reservation.
A double gin and tonic extremely poorly served was an OUTSTANDING 43,50€.  No body warned us.  NEVER BY ANY CIRCUMSTANCE I WOULD COME. Go to the Ritz, I will be cheaper.
